post_title: FS - Two graded Elberfeld NY Sov's and a Titus Sov
post_content:
For Sale - Tough to find Sovereign Portraits.  Prices include shipping, please message if interested and thanks for looking.  Note: NC residents add 6.75% to any agreed upon price to cover ST.

T206 Kid Elberfeld NY Sovereign 350 - PSA 2  $250 venmo no fee or $260 pp gs.

T206 Kid Elberfeld NY Sovereign 150 (there are 2 pin holes but the card is very nice otherwise) - SGC 1 Sold.

T206 John Titus Sovereign 350 - SGC 1  $300 venmo no fee or $312.50 pp gs.
